> clarity and collaboration during the early stages of the DOS68k project.
>

> together with the development team.

## Description
Briefly describe what this pull request changes.

## Motivation
Why is this change needed?

## Scope
What areas does this change affect?

- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Community / governance
- [ ] Code (to be defined)

## Notes
This project is in an early-stage phase.
Expect feedback and iteration as processes evolve.
